entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023
